author: IGN
description:
Check out this trailer for the UniVersus card game showcasing their roadmap for 2026 with the likes of King of Fighters XV, Godzilla, My Hero Academia, TEKKEN 8, Street Fighter 6, and Fairy Tail. 2026 marks the 20th anniversary of the UniVersus game engine.

#IGN
title: UniVersus - Official 2026 Roadmap Trailer (Fairy Tail, Godzilla, My Hero Academia & More)

author: IGN
description:
In today's Daily Fix:
Microsoft had to release a statement today clearing up a rumor that they were abandoning the console hardware business and switching to a third-party publishing model. A rumor from a supposed insider claims that Microsoft has paused development on their next-gen Xbox hardware, prompting many to agree that this seems the likeliest route, especially after hardware and Game Pass price increases have led to severe backlash from fans. Microsoft insists the company is moving forward with the next generation of Xbox hardware. In other news, Aliens: Fireteam Elite 2 has popped up on the ESRB site, prompting speculation that an official announcement is coming soon.

#Xbox #IGN #Gaming
title: Xbox Insists It's Committed to Next-Gen Hardware - IGN Daily Fix

author: IGN
description: Take a look at the Valley of Memory Update Overview for Assassin's Creed Mirage, the hit action-adventure stealth game developed by Ubisoft. Players can soon gain access to the Valley of Memory Update, bringing a suite of new gameplay updates and features alongside new story content with the upcoming expansion. Valley of Memory adds six hours of a new main quest, assassination targets, as well as side quests, contracts, and more. Replayable missions and challenges, updates to the parkour system, difficulty levels, and more will also make their way to Assassin's Creed Mirage Valley of Memory, launching on November 18 for PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, iOS, and PC (Steam, Epic Games Store, and Ubisoft Store).
title: Assassin's Creed Mirage - Official Valley of Memory Update Overview

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Demo Launch Trailer for Mad King Redemption, a 2D arcade beat 'em up roguelite developed by Secret Mission. Players will serve the King the best way possible, slaying toxic enemies in his name from run to run. Take hold of a number of different classes with special abilities catering to an array of different playstyles. Mad King Redemption is coming soon to PC (Steam) with a demo available now on Steam.

#MadKingRedemption #Gaming #IGN
title: Mad King Redemption - Official Demo Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Reveal Trailer for Migration, a crow survival simulation game developed by Define Human. Players will embody the bitter yet serene life of a crow to watch out for predators, enjoy the scenic views, and scavenge for resources. Migration is coming soon to PC (Steam).

#Migration #Gaming #IGN
title: Migration - Official Reveal Trailer

author: IGN
description: Charms are special trinkets that grant Atsu small bonuses that can enhance certain playstyles. Here are our recommendations for the five charms that we recommend picking up early to get you through the first handful of hours of Ghost of Yotei.
title: Ghost of Yotei - The 5 Best Charms to Get Early

author: IGN
description:
In this Hollow Knight Silksong video, we're taking you through how to get all 18 Spool Fragments to get the Extended Achievement. We also explain the requirements needed to purchase a couple of the Spool Fragments, and which Wishes you need to do to get another Spool Fragment. Please use the timestamps below to guide yourself around. 

00:00 - Intro
00:11 - Spool Fragment #1 (Bone Bottom)
01:15 - Spool Fragment #2 (Deep Docks)
02:33 - Spool Fragment #3 (Greymoor)
03:56 - Spool Fragment #4 (Weavenest Atla)
05:15 - Spool Fragment #5 (Bellhart) - This is based on story progress and Wishes in terms of when it becomes available
05:20 - Where to go to complete Missing Courier Wish from Bellhart Wish Board after lifting the curse in Bellhart
06:30 - Spool Fragment #6 (Songclave) - This is based on multiple rounds of Wishes being completed, including Wandering Merchant, Fine Pins, Strengthening Songclave, and finally Lost Merchant
07:15 - Location of Jubilana for Wandering Merchant Wish
09:09
title: Hollow Knight: Silksong - All 18 Spool Fragments | Extended Achievement Guide

author: IGN
description:
With an arsenal of ferocious weapons, brutal finishers, and savage enemies, soulslike action-RPG Phantom Blade Zero has all the makings of a bloody good time. After an hour of uninterrupted combat, boss battles, and more than a few deaths, I came away with one question: how soon can I schedule my sick days? Previewed by Justin Koreis.

#PhantomBladeZero #Gaming #IGN
title: Phantom Blade Zero Is A Delightfully Punishing Action-RPG

author: IGN
description:
Tune in on Tuesday, October 7 at 7am PT / Noon ET / 4pm CEST for a brand new games showcase from Spanish independent game publisher Entalto Publishing and independent Spanish developer GGTech! For those attending the BCN ame Fest in Barcelona, you can watch the showcase live, while checking out demos of the games October 10-12 at the event.
There are a dozen new and unannounced games that will be revealed during the showcase, so this is one you won't want to miss!
title: Out of Bounds Showcase 2025 Livestream

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Minecraft Pack Teaser Trailer for Sonic Racing: Crossworlds, the hit arcade racing game developed by SEGA. Players can get a look at the next content pack with Minecraft, making their way to the new arcade racer. The Minecraft Pack is launching into Sonic Racing: Crossworlds on October 8 for PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch, Nintendo Switch 2, and PC (Steam).

#SonicRacingCrossworlds #Gaming #IGN
title: Sonic Racing: Crossworlds - Official Minecraft Pack Teaser Trailer

author: IGN
description:
IGN's Nick Limon sat down with NVIDIA GeForce evangelist, Jacob Freeman, and Global Art Director at CD Project Red, Jakub Knapik, to talk about the state of PC gaming along with NVIDIA technologies like NVIDIA DLSS, NVIDIA Reflex, and ray reconstruction. Additionally, a glimpse at the future technolgies like neural textures and RTX hair.

Presented by NVIDIA.

#IGN #Gaming
title: How Key Technologies Like NVIDIA DLSS & Ray Tracing Are Shaping the Future of PC Gaming

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Final Trailer for Predator: Badlands, an upcoming addition to the sci-fi action thriller series distributed by 20th Century Studios. Predator: Badlands is in theaters on November 7.

Predator: Badlands, which stars Elle Fanning and Dimitrius Schuster-Koloamatangi, is set in the future on a remote planet, where a young Predator (Schuster-Koloamatangi), outcast from his clan, finds an unlikely ally in Thia (Fanning) and embarks on a treacherous journey in search of the ultimate adversary. The film is directed by Dan Trachtenberg and produced by John Davis, Dan Trachtenberg, Marc Toberoff, Ben Rosenblatt, Brent O’Connor.

Predator: Badlands is in theaters on November 7.

#PredatorBadlands #Movies #IGN
title: Predator: Badlands - Official Final Trailer (2025) Elle Fanning, Dimitrius Schuster-Koloamatangi

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Cinematic Trailer for 2XKO, a 2v2 fighting game developed by Riot Games. Players will master in-depth gameplay mechanics across a diverse set of champions from League of Legends. 

Take a look at the flashy cinematic trailer for 2XKO, launching into Early Access for PC on October 7.

#IGN #2XKO #FightingGames
title: 2XKO - Official Cinematic Trailer

author: IGN
description:
A team of former Age of Empires, Age of Mythology, and Halo Wars developers want to reintroduce you to Fleetbreakers, a new sci-fi outer-space RTS. Check out the playable demo now on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2929040/Fleetbreakers/ 

#IGN #Gaming
title: Fleetbreakers - Official Demo Trailer

author: IGN
description: Enjoy the release date trailer for Bleak Haven, a new first-person survival horror game whose creator says is heavily inspired by the Resident Evil series as well as The Ritual. It's a story-driven, cinematic single-player experience with puzzles, weapon crafting, and brutal combat. And does that monster in the trailer remind those of you who played Inside of anything? Anyway, Bleak Haven will be released on Steam on October 27. Wishlist it if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3566840/Bleak_Haven
title: Bleak Haven - Official Release Date Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Reveal Trailer for Blackwood, a cinematic third-person noir action thriller developed by AttritoM7 Productions. Players will embody Anton Blackwood as a lowly DVD store owner by day, and a deadly assassin by night. Engage in deep melee-based combat with contextual cinematic finishers, explore a neon-lit 2012 New York, and wrangle with key decisions in a narrative focused on choice and consequence. Blackwood is launching in 2026 for PC.

#Blackwood #Gaming #IGN
title: Blackwood - Official Reveal Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Our IGN First for October is Pearl Abyss’ Crimson Desert – the open-world action-adventure set in the fantasy continent of Pywel. First up, we’ve got 11 minutes of brand new gameplay to show you, featuring a full quest as our hero Kliff is tasked with infiltrating a castle and taking down the burly boss at the centre of it. 

We’ll have plenty more Crimson Desert to show you this month ahead of its March 19, 2026 release, including plenty more gameplay and insights from the development team.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Crimson Desert: 11 Minutes of Brand New Gameplay - IGN First

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Valley of Memory Update Teaser Trailer for Assassin's Creed Mirage, the hit action-adventure stealth game developed by Ubisoft. Players can get a glimpse at a new update coming to Assassin's Creed Mirage called Valley of Memory, bringing new content to the game. Don't miss the full reveal for Assassin's Creed Mirage Valley of Memory on October 6 at 9 AM PT.

#AssassinsCreedMirage #Gaming #IGN
title: Assassin's Creed Mirage - Official Valley of Memory Update Teaser Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Descend into evil dungeons in this trailer for the upcoming roguelike, beat'em up game. In Ghost Vanguard, play as a warrior resurrected by the gods. Grab your sword and uncover the truth behind a dark god's dominion. Ghost Vanguard will be available on PC, and a Kickstarter campaign is now live.

#GhostVanguard #Gaming #IGN
title: Ghost Vanguard - Official Kickstarter Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out the 'Dreams on Paper' Trailer for Little Nightmares 3, a co-op horror adventure puzzle game developed by Supermassive Games. 

Players can get a feel for the game's cooperative nature in exploration, platforming, and more in a drawn aesthetic with the latest trailer. Little Nightmares 3 launches on October 10 for PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch, Nintendo Switch 2, and PC (Steam).

#IGN #LittleNightmares3 #Horror
title: Little Nightmares 3 - Official 'Dreams on Paper' Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the official reveal trailer for Villainy, a fast-paced, high-stakes game of social deduction developed by Studio Rend. In this game of cooperation and betrayal, gather your party, but trust no one. Deception is your greatest weapon, and secrecy is the ultimate defense. Villainy is coming soon to PC (Steam).

#Villainy #Gaming #IGN
title: Villainy - Official Reveal Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Steam Next Fest Demo Launch Trailer for '83, a first-person Cold War-era multiplayer shooter developed by Blue Dot Games. Players will use historically accurate weapons and equipment to engage in intense firefights and battles to claim victory. Fight across 40v40 modes in '83, coming soon to PC (Steam) with a demo available now as part of Steam Next Fest.

#83 #Gaming #IGN
title: '83 - Official Steam Next Fest Demo Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Final Trailer Roofman, an upcoming comedic crime drama movie starring Channing Tatum, Kirsten Dunst, Ben Mendelsohn, LaKeith Stanfield, Juno Temple, Melonie Diaz, Uzo Aduba, Lily Collias, Jimmy O. Yang, and Peter Dinklage.

Based on an unbelievable true story, Roofman follows Jeffrey Manchester (Channing Tatum), a former Army Ranger and struggling father who turns to robbing McDonald’s restaurants by cutting holes in their roofs, earning him the nickname: Roofman. After escaping prison, he secretly lives inside a Toys “R” Us for six months, surviving undetected while planning his next move. But when he falls for Leigh (Kirsten Dunst), a divorced mom drawn to his undeniable charm, his double life begins to unravel, setting off a compelling and suspenseful game of cat and mouse as his past closes in.

Roofman is produced by Jamie Patricof, Lynette Howell Taylor, Alex Orlovsky, Duncan Montgomery, and Dylan Sellers. Derek Cianfrance, Channing Tatum, Jonathan Montepare, Char
title: Roofman - Official Final Trailer (2025) Channing Tatum, Kirsten Dunst, Peter Dinklage

author: IGN
description:
Developer Funny Fintan Softworks has just announced a new playable demo for Don't Stop Girlypop! (formerly Incolatus), the upcoming fast-paced competitive arena first-person shooter that mixes glitter with gore and features a nostalgic early-2000s flip phone companion. Play the demo now on Steam if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2610650/Dont_Stop_Girlypop/

#IGN #Gaming
title: Don't Stop Girlypop! – Official Demo Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description:
In 2024, we learned that Marvel Studios co-founder David Maisel is spearheading a new shared universe called Ekos. Launched in conjunction with Aspen Comics and inspired by the work of the late Michael Turner and former DC Chief Creative Officer Geoff Johns, Ekos aims to be the next big shared universe in comics. Ekos Vol. 1 was a big hit on Kickstarter, and now the creators are back for Vol. 2. 

Ekos Vol. 2 is produced by Maisel and Aspen Comics and features a creative team of writer J.T. Krul, pencil artist Alex Konat, digital inker Mark Roslan, color artist Peter Steigerwald, and letterer Josh Reed. The crowdfunding campaign for this graphic novel begins on October 6, 2025.
title: Ekos Vol. 2 - Official Graphic Novel Trailer
